query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS bdd_test_scenarios (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  epic_number INT NOT NULL,
  epic_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  scenario_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  scenario_title VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  given_context TEXT,
  when_action TEXT,
  then_outcome TEXT,
  additional_expectations TEXT,
  status ENUM('PASSED', 'FAILED', 'IN_PROGRESS', 'PENDING') DEFAULT 'PASSED',
  priority ENUM('P0', 'P1', 'P2', 'P3') DEFAULT 'P1',
  implementation_location TEXT,
  test_coverage_method VARCHAR(255),
  expected_values TEXT,
  notes TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_epic (epic_number),
  INDEX idx_status (status),
  INDEX idx_priority (priority),
  INDEX idx_scenario (scenario_number)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

  implementation_location TEXT,
  test_coverage_method VARCHAR(255),
  expected_values TEXT,
  notes TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_epic (epic_number),
  INDEX idx_status (status),
  INDEX idx_priority (priority),
  INDEX idx_scenario (scenario_number)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
